name: Pikachu
desc: Pikachu is an Electric-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It's known for its cute appearance and is the mascot of the Pokemon franchise.

name: Raichu
desc: Raichu is the evolved form of Pikachu and is known for its electrical abilities and speed. It is fully evolved.

name: Clefairy
desc: Clefairy is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its whimsical and fairy-like appearance.

name: Clefable
desc: Clefable is the evolved form of Clefairy and is known for its magical abilities. It is fully evolved.

name: Zubat
desc: Zubat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is often found in caves and is known for its supersonic cries.

name: Golbat
desc: Golbat is the evolved form of Zubat and is known for its large wings and fangs. It is fully evolved.

name: Psyduck
desc: Psyduck is a Water-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It often suffers from frequent headaches that trigger its psychic powers.

name: Golduck
desc: Golduck is a fully evolved Water-type Pokemon known for its strong swimming abilities and psychic powers.

name: Abra
desc: Abra is a Psychic-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its teleportation abilities but is often timid.

name: Kadabra
desc: Kadabra is the evolved form of Abra and is known for its strong psychic powers and the silver spoon it carries.

name: Alakazam
desc: Alakazam is a fully evolved Psychic-type Pokemon with incredible intelligence and psychic abilities. It often carries two spoons.

name: Machop
desc: Machop is a Fighting-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its strong and muscular physique.

name: Machoke
desc: Machoke is the evolved form of Machop and is known for its even greater physical strength and power.

name: Machamp
desc: Machamp is a fully evolved Fighting-type Pokemon with four powerful arms. It is a symbol of strength.

name: Tentacool
desc: Tentacool is a Water/Poison-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its tentacles and ability to poison foes.

name: Tentacruel
desc: Tentacruel is a fully evolved Water/Poison-type Pokemon with even more potent toxins and long, powerful tentacles.

name: Geodude
desc: Geodude is a Rock/Ground-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its rocky body and strength.

name: Graveler
desc: Graveler is the evolved form of Geodude and has multiple arms. It often rolls down mountainsides.

name: Golem
desc: Golem is a fully evolved Rock/Ground-type Pokemon with a sturdy and robust body. It is often used for heavy labor.

name: Ponyta
desc: Ponyta is a Fire-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its fiery mane and swiftness.

name: Rapidash
desc: Rapidash is the evolved form of Ponyta and is known for its incredible speed and flaming mane. It is fully evolved.

name: Magnemite
desc: Magnemite is an Electric/Steel-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is attracted to metal objects.

name: Magneton
desc: Magneton is the evolved form of Magnemite and consists of three Magnemite joined together. It is fully evolved.

name: Gastly
desc: Gastly is a Ghost/Poison-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its gaseous form and mischievous nature.

name: Haunter
desc: Haunter is the evolved form of Gastly and is known for its haunting presence and ability to pass through walls.

name: Gengar
desc: Gengar is a fully evolved Ghost/Poison-type Pokemon and is known for its mischievous and eerie behavior.

name: Onix
desc: Onix is a Rock/Ground-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is a giant snake-like Pokemon.

name: Lickitung
desc: Lickitung is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It has an extremely long and stretchable tongue.

name: Rhyhorn
desc: Rhyhorn is a Ground/Rock-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its sturdy and powerful build.

name: Rhydon
desc: Rhydon is the evolved form of Rhyhorn and is known for its incredible strength and rock-hard hide.

name: Chansey
desc: Chansey is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its incredible kindness and its ability to heal others with its egg-like pouch.

name: Tangela
desc: Tangela is a Grass-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is covered in tangled vines and is known for its regenerative abilities.

name: Goldeen
desc: Goldeen is a Water-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is often seen in bodies of water and is known for its elegant swimming.

name: Seaking
desc: Seaking is a fully evolved Water-type Pokemon and is known for its majestic appearance. It is often called the 'King of the Sea.'

name: Mr. Mime
desc: Mr. Mime is a Psychic-type Pokemon known for its mimicry and pantomime abilities. It can create invisible walls to protect itself.

name: Scyther
desc: Scyther is a Bug/Flying-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is a fast and agile predator with sharp scythes for hands.

name: Electabuzz
desc: Electabuzz is an Electric-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its electrical prowess and the lightning bolt patterns on its body.

name: Magmar
desc: Magmar is a Fire-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is often found near volcanic areas and can generate intense heat.

name: Magikarp
desc: Magikarp is a Water-type Pokemon and is not known for its combat abilities. It is famous for its determination to evolve into a powerful Gyarados.

name: Gyarados
desc: Gyarados is a fully evolved Water/Flying-type Pokemon. It is infamous for its destructive temper and powerful attacks.

name: Eevee
desc: Eevee is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is unique in its ability to evolve into various different forms, depending on factors like friendship and environment.

name: Vaporeon
desc: Vaporeon is one of Eevee's evolved forms and is a Water-type Pokemon. It has the ability to manipulate water and create aquatic environments.

name: Jolteon
desc: Jolteon is one of Eevee's evolved forms and is an Electric-type Pokemon. It has sharp electric spines that can discharge high-voltage shocks.

name: Flareon
desc: Flareon is one of Eevee's evolved forms and is a Fire-type Pokemon. It has a fiery mane and the ability to unleash powerful fire attacks.

name: Porygon
desc: Porygon is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is a virtual Pokemon created from computer code.

name: Snorlax
desc: Snorlax is a large and sleepy Normal-type Pokemon. It is known for blocking paths and having an insatiable appetite.

name: Hoothoot
desc: Hoothoot is a Normal/Flying-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its keen sense of time and its hooting cries.

name: Noctowl
desc: Noctowl is a fully evolved Normal/Flying-type Pokemon with excellent night vision and the ability to rotate its head 180 degrees.

name: Crobat
desc: Crobat is a Poison/Flying-type Pokemon and is the evolved form of Golbat. It is known for its speed and agility during flight.

name: Pichu
desc: Pichu is an Electric-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is the baby form of Pikachu and is known for its cuteness.

name: Cleffa
desc: Cleffa is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is the baby form of Clefairy and is known for its star-shaped body.

name: Togepi
desc: Togepi is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its eggshell and the joy it brings to those who care for it.

name: Togetic
desc: Togetic is the evolved form of Togepi and is known for its ability to spread happiness and positive emotions.

name: Marill
desc: Marill is a Water-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It has a distinctive blue ball on its tail and is known for its cheerful disposition.

name: Azumarill
desc: Azumarill is the evolved form of Marill and is known for its strong and powerful tail. It can use its tail to perform powerful jumps.

name: Sudowoodo
desc: Sudowoodo is a Rock-type Pokemon known for its mimicry of a tree. It often fools travelers and can be quite stubborn.

name: Aipom
desc: Aipom is a Normal-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It has a distinctive hand-like tail and is known for its mischievous behavior.

name: Yanma
desc: Yanma is a Bug/Flying-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its speed and agility during flight.

name: Wooper
desc: Wooper is a Water/Ground-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is often found near water and is known for its cheerful disposition.

name: Quagsire
desc: Quagsire is the evolved form of Wooper and is known for its carefree and relaxed nature. It often floats in water.

name: Espeon
desc: Espeon is a Psychic-type Pokemon and is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is known for its psychic abilities and graceful appearance.

name: Umbreon
desc: Umbreon is a Dark-type Pokemon and is one of Eevee's evolved forms. It is known for its ability to manipulate darkness and shadows.

name: Murkrow
desc: Murkrow is a Dark/Flying-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is often associated with superstitions and bad omens.

name: Misdreavus
desc: Misdreavus is a Ghost-type Pokemon and is not fully evolved (NFE). It is known for its playful and mischievous nature.

name: Unown
desc: Unown is a mysterious Psychic-type Pokemon known for its unique shapes that resemble letters and punctuation marks. It has multiple forms, each corresponding to a letter of the alphabet and some special characters.

forms.name: Unown A
forms.desc: Unown A is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'A.'

forms.name: Unown B
forms.desc: Unown B is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'B.'

forms.desc: Unown C is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'C.'

forms.desc: Unown G is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'G.'

forms.desc: Unown P is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'P.'

forms.desc: Unown Q is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'Q.'

forms.desc: Unown R is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'R.'

forms.desc: Unown S is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'S.'

forms.desc: Unown T is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'T.'

forms.desc: Unown U is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'U.'

forms.desc: Unown Y is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'Y.'

forms.name: Unown Z
forms.desc: Unown Z is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles the letter 'Z.'

forms.desc: Unown ! is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles an exclamation mark.

forms.name: Unown ?
forms.desc: Unown ? is one of the forms of Unown. Its shape resembles a question mark.

name: Girafarig
desc: Girafarig is a dual-type Normal/Psychic Pokemon. It has a unique appearance with a head at both ends of its body. The tail head is mischievous and can bite, while the front head is more docile.

name: Gligar
desc: Gligar is a dual-type Ground/Flying Pokemon. It resembles a bat and is known for its gliding abilities. It is often found in mountainous regions.

name: Steelix
desc: Steelix is a dual-type Steel/Ground Pokemon. It is a large, serpentine Pokemon known for its incredibly hard steel body. It evolves from Onix when traded holding a Metal Coat.

name: Scizor
desc: Scizor is a dual-type Bug/Steel Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Scyther and is known for its speed and cutting abilities. Scizor evolves from Scyther when traded holding a Metal Coat.

name: Heracross
desc: Heracross is a dual-type Bug/Fighting Pokemon. It is known for its strength and is often seen carrying a large log to use as a weapon. It can Mega Evolve into Mega Heracross.

name: Sneasel
desc: Sneasel is a dual-type Dark/Ice Pokemon. It has sharp claws and is known for its agility and stealthy movements. Sneasel evolves into Weavile when leveled up holding a Razor Claw at night.

name: Swinub
desc: Swinub is a dual-type Ice/Ground Pokemon. It resembles a small pig covered in ice. It evolves into Piloswine starting at level 33.

name: Piloswine
desc: Piloswine is a dual-type Ice/Ground Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Swinub and is known for its tough hide and ability to survive in harsh cold environments.

name: Remoraid
desc: Remoraid is a Water-type Pokemon. It resembles a fish and can shoot water from its mouth to propel itself. It evolves into Octillery starting at level 25.

name: Octillery
desc: Octillery is a Water-type Pokemon. It is known for its long tentacles and strong suction abilities. It is the evolved form of Remoraid.

name: Mantine
desc: Mantine is a dual-type Water/Flying Pokemon. It resembles a manta ray and is known for its graceful swimming. Mantine can breed with a Ditto to produce a Mantyke.

name: Houndour
desc: Houndour is a dual-type Dark/Fire Pokemon. It resembles a small, black dog with red eyes and is known for its fiery breath. It evolves into Houndoom starting at level 24.

name: Houndoom
desc: Houndoom is a dual-type Dark/Fire Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Houndour and is known for its devilish appearance and powerful fire-based attacks.

name: Porygon2
desc: Porygon2 is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is an improved version of Porygon and is known for its digital and computer-like appearance.

name: Elekid
desc: Elekid is an Electric-type Pokemon. It resembles a baby with horns on its head and is known for its electrical abilities. Elekid evolves into Electabuzz when traded holding an Electirizer.

name: Magby
desc: Magby is a Fire-type Pokemon. It resembles a baby with a flame at the tip of its tail. Magby evolves into Magmar when traded holding a Magmarizer.

name: Blissey
desc: Blissey is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is known for its incredibly high HP and healing abilities. Blissey evolves from Chansey when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Wurmple
desc: Wurmple is a Bug-type Pokemon. It resembles a caterpillar and is known for its various evolutionary forms, which can become either Silcoon or Cascoon.

name: Silcoon
desc: Silcoon is a Bug-type Pokemon. It is one of the evolutionary forms of Wurmple and eventually evolves into Beautifly.

name: Beautifly
desc: Beautifly is a dual-type Bug/Flying Pokemon. It is one of the evolutionary forms of Wurmple and is known for its beautiful and colorful wings.

name: Cascoon
desc: Cascoon is a Bug-type Pokemon. It is one of the evolutionary forms of Wurmple and eventually evolves into Dustox.

name: Dustox
desc: Dustox is a dual-type Bug/Poison Pokemon. It is one of the evolutionary forms of Wurmple and is known for its toxic dust and wings.

name: Wingull
desc: Wingull is a dual-type Water/Flying Pokemon. It resembles a seagull and is often seen near bodies of water. It evolves into Pelipper.

name: Pelipper
desc: Pelipper is a dual-type Water/Flying Pokemon. It is known for carrying small Pokemon in its beak and delivering them to their destination. It is the evolved form of Wingull.

name: Ralts
desc: Ralts is a Psychic-type Pokemon. It is known for its empathic abilities and is the first stage in its evolutionary line. Ralts evolves into Kirlia.

name: Kirlia
desc: Kirlia is a Psychic-type Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Ralts and is known for its graceful appearance. Kirlia can evolve into either Gardevoir or Gallade.

name: Gardevoir
desc: Gardevoir is a Psychic-type Pokemon. It is the final form of Ralts' evolutionary line and is known for its elegance and psychic abilities.

name: Azurill
desc: Azurill is a Normal-type Pokemon. It resembles a baby with a blue body and is known for its playful and bouncy nature. Azurill evolves into Marill when leveled up with high friendship.

name: Nosepass
desc: Nosepass is a Rock-type Pokemon. It resembles a large-nosed head and is known for its magnetic abilities. Nosepass evolves into Probopass when leveled up in a magnetic field.

name: Meditite
desc: Meditite is a dual-type Fighting/Psychic Pokemon. It is known for its meditation and yoga practices, which enhance its physical and mental abilities. Meditite evolves into Medicham.

name: Medicham
desc: Medicham is a dual-type Fighting/Psychic Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Meditite and is known for its martial arts and psychic powers. Mega Medicham can Mega Evolve.

name: Roselia
desc: Roselia is a dual-type Grass/Poison Pokemon. It is known for its beautiful roses and is often used in herbal medicine. Roselia evolves into Roserade when exposed to a Shiny Stone.

name: Swablu
desc: Swablu is a dual-type Normal/Flying Pokemon. It resembles a small bird with cotton-like fluffy wings. Swablu evolves into Altaria.

name: Altaria
desc: Altaria is a dual-type Dragon/Flying Pokemon. It is the evolved form of Swablu and is known for its serene and majestic appearance. Mega Altaria can Mega Evolve.

name: Barboach
desc: Barboach is a dual-type Water/Ground Pokemon. It resembles a fish with whiskers and is known for its ability to burrow underground. Barboach evolves into Whiscash starting at level 30.

name: Whiscash
desc: Whiscash is known for living in ponds and lakes. It creates underground dens in riverbeds and burrows into muddy waters. It is often seen as a symbol of longevity and is said to bring good fortune to those who encounter it.

name: Feebas
desc: Feebas is a rare and elusive Pokemon known for its plain appearance. However, when it evolves into Milotic, it transforms into a beautiful and elegant Water-type Pokemon with mesmerizing scales.

name: Milotic
desc: Milotic is often regarded as one of the most beautiful and graceful Pokemon. Its captivating appearance and gentle nature make it a symbol of elegance and serenity. It is said to have the power to calm conflicts with its presence.

name: Duskull
desc: Duskull is known for its eerie and haunting appearance. It is often associated with the spirit world and is said to appear before those who are nearing the end of their life. Its presence is both feared and respected.

name: Dusclops
desc: Dusclops is the evolved form of Duskull. It is known for its mysterious and enigmatic nature. Its eye-like markings are said to be able to see into other dimensions. It is often found guarding ancient tombs and treasures.

name: Tropius
desc: Tropius is a tropical and plant-like Pokemon that is known for its large leaves, which serve as a source of food for both itself and other Pokemon. It can fly using its leaf-like wings and is often associated with lush and tropical environments.

name: Chimecho
desc: Chimecho is a small and bell-like Pokemon that creates soothing and melodic sounds with its tail. It is believed to bring good dreams to those who hear its chimes at night. It is a rare and elusive Pokemon often found in high mountain regions.

name: Absol
desc: Absol is known as the 'Disaster Pokemon' due to its ability to sense impending natural disasters such as earthquakes and tsunamis. While it is often seen as a harbinger of doom, it actually tries to warn people of impending danger.

name: Snorunt
desc: Snorunt is an Ice-type Pokemon known for its affinity for cold and snowy environments. It has an icy mask that resembles a human face. It is said to be playful but mischievous.

name: Glalie
desc: Glalie is the evolved form of Snorunt. It has a large, icy head that can freeze its breath and create powerful ice blasts. It is known for its aggressive and relentless nature in battles.

name: Turtwig
desc: Turtwig is a Grass-type Pokemon known for the tiny plant that grows on its head. It is often seen as a symbol of new beginnings and growth. Turtwig's shell hardens with age and becomes sturdy, allowing it to withstand attacks.

name: Grotle
desc: Grotle is the evolved form of Turtwig. It has a large and heavy shell on its back that provides protection and can be used as a shield. Grotle is often found in forests and woodlands.

name: Torterra
desc: Torterra is the final evolved form of Turtwig. It is a massive and majestic Pokemon that carries a miniature ecosystem on its back. Trees and plants grow on its shell, and it is said to create a harmonious environment around it.

name: Chimchar
desc: Chimchar is a Fire-type Pokemon known for the flame on its tail. It is highly energetic and is always on the move. Chimchar's fiery nature makes it a symbol of passion and determination.

name: Monferno
desc: Monferno is the evolved form of Chimchar. It has gained fighting abilities and can use powerful martial arts moves. Monferno's fiery fists are its main weapons in battles.

name: Infernape
desc: Infernape is the final evolved form of Chimchar. It is a Fire and Fighting type Pokemon known for its agility and combat skills. Infernape's fiery crown is a symbol of its mastery over flames and martial arts.

name: Piplup
desc: Piplup is a Water-type Pokemon known for its penguin-like appearance. It is often seen as a symbol of determination and resilience. Piplup can create and control ice with its special abilities.

name: Prinplup
desc: Prinplup is the evolved form of Piplup. It has a more refined and elegant appearance. Prinplup is known for its strong sense of pride and is often seen as a noble and regal Pokemon.

name: Empoleon
desc: Empoleon is the final evolved form of Piplup. It is a Water and Steel type Pokemon known for its royal and majestic demeanor. Empoleon's trident-like beak is a symbol of its power and authority.

name: Starly
desc: Starly is a common sight in the skies. It is known for its cheerful and friendly nature. Starly often travels in flocks and is considered a symbol of freedom and exploration.

name: Staravia
desc: Staravia is the evolved form of Starly. It has strong wings and is known for its impressive flying abilities. Staravia is often seen as a symbol of growth and progress in a trainer's journey.

name: Staraptor
desc: Staraptor is the final evolved form of Starly. It is a powerful and agile Pokemon with exceptional flying and hunting skills. Staraptor is often associated with bravery and courage.

name: Bidoof
desc: Bidoof is a simple and industrious Pokemon known for its strong teeth, which it uses to gnaw on logs and tough plants. It is often seen as a symbol of hard work and perseverance.

name: Bibarel
desc: Bibarel is the evolved form of Bidoof. It has the ability to build dams and control water flow. Bibarel is often found near bodies of water and is considered a symbol of engineering and resourcefulness.

name: Kricketot
desc: Kricketot is a Bug-type Pokemon known for its chirping and musical sounds. It communicates with others of its kind through its rhythmic chirps. Kricketot is often seen as a symbol of harmony in nature.

name: Kricketune
desc: Kricketune is the evolved form of Kricketot. It is known for its melodic and enchanting songs produced by its wings. Kricketune's music is believed to have the power to influence emotions and moods.

name: Shinx
desc: Shinx is an Electric-type Pokemon known for its cute and playful appearance. It generates electricity in its fur and is often seen as a symbol of energy and youthfulness.

name: Luxio
desc: Luxio is the evolved form of Shinx. It has sharp claws and is known for its strong sense of pride and independence. Luxio's electric abilities make it a formidable opponent in battles.

name: Luxray
desc: Luxray is the final evolved form of Shinx. It has keen eyesight and is known for its ability to see through objects. Luxray is often associated with vigilance and guardianship.

name: Budew
desc: Budew is a Grass and Poison type Pokemon known for the bud on its head that releases a pleasant fragrance. It is often seen as a symbol of natural beauty and serenity.

name: Roserade
desc: Roserade is the evolved form of Budew. It is a graceful and elegant Pokemon known for its striking appearance and the bouquet of roses it carries. Roserade is often associated with romance and beauty.

name: Cranidos
desc: Cranidos is a Rock-type Pokemon known for its sturdy head and powerful headbutts. It is often seen as a symbol of determination and resilience in the face of challenges.

name: Rampardos
desc: Rampardos is the evolved form of Cranidos. It has an incredibly hard head that can break through rocks and obstacles. Rampardos is often associated with strength and determination.

name: Shieldon
desc: Shieldon is a Rock and Steel type Pokemon known for its sturdy shield-like face. It is often seen as a symbol of protection and defense. Shieldon's fossilized appearance is a testament to its ancient origins.

name: Bastiodon
desc: Bastiodon is the evolved form of Shieldon. It has a massive and impenetrable shield that it uses to protect itself and its allies. Bastiodon is often regarded as a symbol of guardianship and strength.

forms.name: Burmy Plant
forms.desc: Burmy Plant is a Bug-type Pokemon known for its ability to blend in with leaves and plants. It uses its natural camouflage to hide from predators and is often found in lush forests.

forms.name: Burmy Sandy
forms.desc: Burmy Sandy is a Bug-type Pokemon adapted to sandy environments. Its sand-covered body provides protection against harsh desert conditions, and it is skilled at digging burrows.

forms.name: Burmy Trash
forms.desc: Burmy Trash is a Bug-type Pokemon that collects and carries debris and trash. It uses this garbage to build protective layers and is often found near urban areas.

forms.name: Wormadam Plant
forms.desc: Wormadam Plant is a Bug and Grass-type Pokemon known for its leafy cloak. It lives among trees and plants, using its cloak for camouflage and protection.

forms.name: Wormadam Sandy
forms.desc: Wormadam Sandy is a Bug and Ground-type Pokemon with a sandy cloak. It is well-adapted to arid environments and can withstand droughts with ease.

forms.name: Wormadam Trash
forms.desc: Wormadam Trash is a Bug and Steel-type Pokemon that creates a sturdy cloak from metal scraps. It is often found near industrial areas and is known for its resilience.

name: Mothim
desc: Mothim is a Bug and Flying-type Pokemon known for its graceful and colorful wings. It is often seen fluttering among flowers and is considered a symbol of beauty and elegance.

name: Combee
desc: Combee is a Bug and Flying-type Pokemon known for its social behavior. It lives in colonies and works together with its fellow Combee to gather nectar from flowers.

name: Vespiquen
desc: Vespiquen is a Bug and Flying-type Pokemon known for its role as the queen of its hive. It protects and leads a colony of Combee and is often associated with leadership and authority.

name: Pachirisu
desc: Pachirisu is an Electric-type Pokemon known for its cheek pouches that store electricity. It is often seen as a symbol of energy and vitality, and its fluffy appearance is quite charming.

name: Buizel
desc: Buizel is a Water-type Pokemon known for its playful nature. It is a skilled swimmer and can use its flotation sacs to navigate through water with ease.

name: Floatzel
desc: Floatzel is the evolved form of Buizel. It is a Water-type Pokemon that uses its powerful tails to propel itself through the water at high speeds. Floatzel is often associated with swiftness and agility.

name: Cherubi
desc: Cherubi is a Grass-type Pokemon known for the small fruit growing on its head. It is often seen as a symbol of fertility and abundance. Cherubi's fruit is sweet and tasty.

forms.name: Cherrim
forms.desc: Cherrim is a Grass-type Pokemon known for its ability to change form based on the weather. In its Sunshine Form, it opens up like a blossoming flower and is often associated with sunny days.

forms.name: Cherrim
forms.desc: Cherrim's Sunshine Form is its form when exposed to strong sunlight. It becomes more vibrant and colorful, symbolizing the beauty of nature in full bloom.

forms.name: Shellos
forms.desc: Shellos is a Water-type Pokemon known for its unique appearance and vibrant colors. It inhabits bodies of water and is often seen as a symbol of aquatic beauty.

forms.name: Shellos
forms.desc: Shellos from the east side is known for its blue and green colors. It thrives in eastern aquatic environments and is often seen as a symbol of coastal beauty.

forms.name: Gastrodon
forms.desc: Gastrodon is a Water and Ground-type Pokemon known for its adaptable nature. It can change its form based on its habitat, allowing it to thrive in different aquatic environments.

forms.name: Gastrodon
forms.desc: Gastrodon from the east side is adapted to coastal habitats. Its colors help it blend into the ocean, and it is often seen as a symbol of harmony with the sea.

name: Ambipom
desc: Ambipom is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its dexterity and agility. Its multiple tails give it excellent balance, making it a skilled climber and acrobat.

name: Drifloon
desc: Drifloon is a Ghost and Flying-type Pokemon that resembles a balloon. It is known for its mischievous nature, as it floats around and tries to carry away children who grab onto its string.

name: Drifblim
desc: Drifblim is the evolved form of Drifloon and is a Ghost and Flying-type Pokemon. It can carry people and other Pokemon in its body, making it a popular mode of transportation in some regions.

name: Buneary
desc: Buneary is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its long ears and fluffy fur. It is often seen as a symbol of cuteness and is a favorite among trainers for its adorable appearance.

name: Lopunny
desc: Lopunny is the evolved form of Buneary and is a Normal-type Pokemon. It is known for its graceful and elegant movements, often captivating those who watch its dances.

name: Mismagius
desc: Mismagius is a Ghost-type Pokemon known for its mystical and magical abilities. It is often associated with spells and enchantments and is believed to bring good fortune to those who encounter it.

name: Honchkrow
desc: Honchkrow is a Dark and Flying-type Pokemon known for its role as a leader among Murkrow. It is often seen as a symbol of authority and is said to bring bad luck to those who cross its path.

name: Glameow
desc: Glameow is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its elegant and graceful movements. It is often seen as a symbol of beauty and is admired for its sleek and stylish appearance.

name: Purugly
desc: Purugly is the evolved form of Glameow and is a Normal-type Pokemon. Despite its elegant appearance, it has a fierce and territorial nature, often engaging in battles to defend its territory.

name: Chingling
desc: Chingling is a Psychic-type Pokemon known for its melodious chime. It is often associated with good luck and is believed to bring harmony and positive energy to those who hear its bell-like sound.

name: Stunky
desc: Stunky is a Poison and Dark-type Pokemon known for its foul odor. It uses its scent as a defense mechanism and is often found in urban areas where it scavenges for food.

name: Skuntank
desc: Skuntank is the evolved form of Stunky and is a Poison and Dark-type Pokemon. It has a powerful spray that can emit a noxious gas, making it a formidable opponent in battles.

name: Bronzor
desc: Bronzor is a Steel and Psychic-type Pokemon known for its reflective body. It is often associated with divination and is believed to have the power to see the future in its reflective surface.

name: Bronzong
desc: Bronzong is the evolved form of Bronzor and is a Steel and Psychic-type Pokemon. It is often seen as a guardian of ancient temples and is said to possess mystical powers.

name: Bonsly
desc: Bonsly is a Rock-type Pokemon known for its resemblance to a bonsai tree. It is often seen as a symbol of patience and endurance and is a popular choice for trainers who appreciate bonsai art.

name: Mime Jr.
desc: Mime Jr. is a Psychic-type Pokemon known for its miming abilities. It often entertains others with its playful and comical performances, making it a favorite among children.

name: Happiny
desc: Happiny is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its nurturing nature. It carries an egg-shaped rock and cares for it as if it were its own baby, symbolizing maternal love and care.

name: Chatot
desc: Chatot is a Normal and Flying-type Pokemon known for its ability to mimic human speech and sounds. It is often kept as a pet by people who enjoy its entertaining mimicry.

name: Spiritomb
desc: Spiritomb is a Ghost and Dark-type Pokemon known for its mysterious and eerie appearance. It is believed to be the embodiment of 108 lost spirits and is often associated with curses and haunted places.

name: Gible
desc: Gible is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokemon known for its love of digging and creating tunnels. It has a strong jaw and is capable of crushing rocks with its powerful bite.

name: Gabite
desc: Gabite is the evolved form of Gible and is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokemon. It is an adept hunter and often ambushes its prey from tunnels it has dug.

name: Garchomp
desc: Garchomp is the final evolution of Gible and is a Dragon and Ground-type Pokemon. It is known for its incredible speed and power, often likened to a jet plane as it soars through the sky.

name: Munchlax
desc: Munchlax is a Normal-type Pokemon known for its insatiable appetite. It is often seen eating and snoozing, and its hunger knows no bounds.

name: Riolu
desc: Riolu is a Fighting-type Pokemon known for its strong sense of justice and determination. It can sense the auras of others and is often trained to become a powerful fighter.

name: Lucario
desc: Lucario is the evolved form of Riolu and is a Fighting and Steel-type Pokemon. It is a master of aura manipulation and is often seen as a guardian of peace and justice.

name: Hippopotas
desc: Hippopotas is a Ground-type Pokemon known for its sandy appearance. It is often seen in deserts and arid regions, where it digs and creates sand dunes.

name: Hippowdon
desc: Hippowdon is the evolved form of Hippopotas and is a Ground-type Pokemon. It is known for its immense strength and ability to manipulate sandstorms, shaping the terrain to its advantage.

name: Skorupi
desc: Skorupi is a small, poisonous bug Pokemon. It is the pre-evolution of Drapion.

name: Drapion
desc: Drapion is a large, venomous scorpion Pokemon with a dual typing of poison and dark.

name: Croagunk
desc: Croagunk is a frog-like Pokemon known for its poison and fighting abilities. It evolves into Toxicroak.

name: Toxicroak
desc: Toxicroak is a menacing poison and fighting type Pokemon known for its toxic punches.

name: Carnivine
desc: Carnivine is a grass type Pokemon that resembles a carnivorous plant with large jaws.

name: Finneon
desc: Finneon is a small, fish-like Pokemon that lives in the water. It is the pre-evolution of Lumineon.

name: Lumineon
desc: Lumineon is a graceful water type Pokemon known for its beauty and swimming abilities.

name: Mantyke
desc: Mantyke is a water and flying type Pokemon that resembles a manta ray. It is the pre-evolution of Mantine.

name: Snover
desc: Snover is a grass and ice type Pokemon that resembles a snowy tree. It is the pre-evolution of Abomasnow.

name: Abomasnow
desc: Abomasnow is a powerful grass and ice type Pokemon known for its wintry appearance and abilities.

name: Weavile
desc: Weavile is a fast and agile dark and ice type Pokemon known for its cunning and sharp claws.

name: Magnezone
desc: Magnezone is an electric and steel type Pokemon that evolves from Magneton in areas with strong magnetic fields.

name: Lickilicky
desc: Lickilicky is a normal type Pokemon and the evolved form of Lickitung. It has a long, stretchable tongue.

name: Rhyperior
desc: Rhyperior is a powerful ground and rock type Pokemon with a formidable appearance.

name: Tangrowth
desc: Tangrowth is a grass type Pokemon that evolves from Tangela when exposed to a special evolution method.

name: Electivire
desc: Electivire is an electric type Pokemon known for its electrical power and charging capabilities.

name: Magmortar
desc: Magmortar is a fire type Pokemon known for its fiery attacks and cannon-like arms.

name: Togekiss
desc: Togekiss is a graceful and kind-hearted Pokemon with both normal and flying types.

name: Yanmega
desc: Yanmega is a bug and flying type Pokemon known for its impressive speed and aerial abilities.

name: Leafeon
desc: Leafeon is an evolution of Eevee that has adapted to a grassy environment.

name: Glaceon
desc: Glaceon is an evolution of Eevee that has adapted to a snowy and icy environment.

name: Gliscor
desc: Gliscor is a ground and flying type Pokemon known for its agility and unique typing.

name: Mamoswine
desc: Mamoswine is an ice and ground type Pokemon with a woolly mammoth-like appearance.

name: Porygon-Z
desc: Porygon-Z is a normal type Pokemon known for its computer code-like appearance.

name: Gallade
desc: Gallade is a psychic and fighting type Pokemon known for its chivalrous nature and sword-like arms.

name: Probopass
desc: Probopass is a rock and steel type Pokemon with a distinctive magnetic nose.

name: Dusknoir
desc: Dusknoir is a ghost type Pokemon known for its enigmatic and eerie presence.

name: Froslass
desc: Froslass is an ice and ghost type Pokemon that is said to lure in lost travelers with its beauty.

forms.name: Rotom
forms.desc: Rotom is an electric and ghost type Pokemon known for its ability to possess appliances.

forms.name: Rotom Fan
forms.desc: Rotom Fan is a form of Rotom that takes on an electric and flying type when possessing a fan appliance.

forms.name: Rotom Frost
forms.desc: Rotom Frost is a form of Rotom that takes on an electric and ice type when possessing a refrigerator.

forms.name: Rotom Heat
forms.desc: Rotom Heat is a form of Rotom that takes on an electric and fire type when possessing an oven.

forms.name: Rotom Mow
forms.desc: Rotom Mow is a form of Rotom that takes on an electric and grass type when possessing a lawnmower.

forms.name: Rotom Wash
forms.desc: Rotom Wash is a form of Rotom that takes on an electric and water type when possessing a washing machine.

name: Uxie
desc: Uxie is a legendary psychic type Pokemon known for its ability to erase memories.

name: Mesprit
desc: Mesprit is a legendary psychic type Pokemon associated with emotions and willpower.

name: Azelf
desc: Azelf is a legendary psychic type Pokemon known for its connection to willpower and determination.

name: Dialga
desc: Dialga is a legendary Pokemon with control over time and a dual typing of steel and dragon.

name: Palkia
desc: Palkia is a legendary Pokemon known for its control over space and its dual typing of water and dragon.

name: Heatran
desc: Heatran is a legendary Pokemon with a dual typing of fire and steel. It is associated with volcanic activity.

name: Regigigas
desc: Regigigas is a legendary Pokemon known for its incredible strength and the ability to move continents.

forms.name: Giratina
forms.desc: Giratina is a legendary Pokemon known for its connection to the Distortion World and its dual typing of ghost and dragon.

forms.name: Giratina Origin
forms.desc: Giratina Origin is a form of Giratina that takes on a more powerful appearance.

name: Cresselia
desc: Cresselia is a legendary psychic type Pokemon known for bringing peaceful dreams to those it encounters.

name: Phione
desc: Phione is a rare, water type Pokemon that is considered a Mythical Pokemon and is known for its connection to Manaphy.

name: Manaphy
desc: Manaphy is a Mythical Pokemon known for its ability to bond with other Pokemon and its connection to the sea.

name: Darkrai
desc: Darkrai is a legendary Pokemon known for its ability to induce nightmares and its dark typing.

forms.name: Shaymin
forms.desc: Shaymin is a Mythical Pokemon known for its cute appearance and its ability to transform into Shaymin Sky Form.

forms.name: Shaymin Sky
forms.desc: Shaymin Sky Form is a flying and grass type form of Shaymin that has enhanced abilities and a different appearance.

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus is a mythical Pokemon often considered the god of all Pokemon, associated with the creation of the Pokemon world.

forms.name: Arceus
forms.desc: Arceus can take on various forms, including the Bug type form, which changes its typing and abilities.
